title: Khadin
description: A classified marketplace platform built with Next.js, Laravel, and Flutter. Responsible for full-stack customization and DevOps management.

title: UploadCafe
description: A file-sharing SaaS featuring a dual-monetization model (subscriptions and PPD) with secure wallet management and Cloudflare R2 storage.

title: BeyondStar Pharmacy System
description: A tailored pharmacy management system with bulk medicine import features and streamlined sales/purchase workflows.

title: Webzez
description: A multi-tenant SaaS platform allowing users to launch their own eCommerce stores instantly. Managed core codebase and engineered new features.

title: HRSoft
description: A comprehensive HR solution featuring employee lifecycle management and an automated payroll engine. Featuring ZKTeco Biometric Integration for real-time automated attendance tracking.

title: On-Demand
description: A real-time booking platform with multi-tenant data isolation and secure Role-Based Access Control (RBAC).

title: Acme Electronics
description: A custom eCommerce platform integrated with Amazon Selling Partner API (SP API) for real-time stock and order synchronization.

title: Redaxify
description: A specialized tool for video/audio redaction and summarization, featuring Azure Indexing API integration.
